name: OpenSourceMorons Doc Project
short_description:
The primary goal of the OpenSourceMorons Doc Project is to provide high quality, easy to understand 
quick-start guides and other documentation for various popular open source projects. 
Emphasis is on easy to understand quick-start guides with clear, well illustrated, step-by-step 
instructions which will enable users to get up and running more quickly.

Several related guides are in the process of being written right now for applications which are 
particularly "hot" due to recent events related to online privacy (or lack thereof).
The first guide published will most likely be the Tor Browser Bundle QuickStart Guide.
 And the Gpg4win QuickStart Guide should follow shortly after that.

For any questions, comments, or suggestions, please post in the discussion forums:
https://sourceforge.net/p/opensourcemorons/discussion/
summary: High Quality Documentation for Popular Open Source Projects
